title: Fund managers haven't been this bearish on tech stocks since 2006 - Economic Times
content: Fund managers haven't been this bearish on tech stocks since 2006  Economic Times
description: Fund managers are the most underweight on technology stocks in nearly 16 years in anticipation of an aggressive tightening by the US Federal Reserve, showed Bank of America Corp's latest fund manager survey. The survey showed that net allocation to the tech sector fell to the lowest since August 2006.
